It's an idea I had for the start of the 50 project.  A slightly
amended beginning.

The idea is 2-3 scenarios where you can hire your entire team and
start upgrading your team WITHOUT putting them into harm's way right
away.  I haven't quite finished with the lower part of the fort, though.

The idea for the lower part is front entrance, then a small area for
archers to cheat at incoming troops before they enter the main area.
